info.name: dim_brighten_rate_01
info.description: Using 2 dim fixtures to test a dim and brighten rates. Usuing only setmultiple fixture levels for simplicity and using 30sec and 60sec dim and brighten rate for each fixture.

body.raw:

exec: tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 0 but less than 20 "] = (out1<20&&out1>0);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 0 but less than 20 "] = (out2<20&&out2>0);
tests["Value of pwm output 019D35B9 is greater than 0 but less than 20 "] = (out3<20&&out3>0);
tests["Value of pwm output 019D36B9 is greater than 0 but less than 20 "] = (out4<20&&out4>0);
tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 10 but less than 50 "] = (out1<=50&&out1>10);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 5 but less than 25 "] = (out2<25&&out2>5);
tests["Value of pwm output 019D35B9 is greater than 10 but less than 50 "] = (out3<=50&&out3>10);
tests["Value of pwm output 019D36B9 is greater than 5 but less than 25 "] = (out4<25&&out4>5);
tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 40 but less than 85 "] = (out1<85&&out1>40);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 15 but less than 53 "] = (out2<53&&out2>15);
tests["Value of pwm output 019D35B9 is greater than 40 but less than 80 "] = (out3<80&&out3>40);
tests["Value of pwm output 019D36B9 is greater than 15 but less than 50 "] = (out4<50&&out4>15);
